# C++ Practice Tasks (tasks generated by ChatGPT)

This folder contains **27 C++ programming tasks** generated with the help of **ChatGPT** and solved as part of additional practice outside of regular college assignments.

## Folder Contents

The directory includes the following files:

- `task01.cpp` â€“ `task27.cpp`

## Compilation & Execution

Any task can be compiled and executed using a standard C++ compiler. Example:

```
g++ task01.cpp -o task01
./task01
```
